statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1 AND current_stock < min_stock_threshold;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_name = 'ABC' AND min_stock_threshold > 10;
DELETE FROM Procurement WHERE order_id = 200 AND item_id = 105;
DELETE FROM procurement WHERE procurement_id = 101 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND order_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE id = 100 AND stock_level < 10;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE quantity < 5) AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Procurement WHERE product_id = 2002 AND supplier_id = 3003;
